scripts.docker:clear: docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -f dangling=true -q) && docker rm -f $(docker ps -a --filter name=^nmt- -q) && docker rmi $(docker images -f dangling=true -q)
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npx tsc --noEmit false && tsc-alias
scripts.graph:deps:generate:v1: npx depcruise src --include-only '^src' --output-type dot | dot -T svg > ./docs/dependency-graph-v1.svg
scripts.graph:deps:generate:v2: npx depcruise src --include-only '^src' --progress  --config .dependency-cruiser.cjs --output-type dot | dot -T svg -Grankdir=TD | tee docs/dependency-graph-v2.svg | node node_modules/dependency-cruiser/bin/wrap-stream-in-html.mjs > docs/dependency-graph-v2.html
scripts.graph:deps:generate:top-level: npx depcruise src --include-only '^src' --config .dependency-cruiser.cjs --output-type ddot | dot -T svg -Grankdir=TD | tee docs/dependency-graph-top-level.svg | node node_modules/dependency-cruiser/bin/wrap-stream-in-html.mjs > docs/dependency-graph-top-level.html
scripts.graph:deps:generate:all: npm run graph:deps:generate:v1 && npm run graph:deps:generate:v2 && npm run graph:deps:generate:top-level
